inputControl.name: Product_Name
inputControl.label: Product Name
inputControl.description: Displays distinct "Product's Names" depending upon the "Product Category" is selected.

localResource.name: ProductName_Query
localResource.label: ProductName Query
localResource.queryString: select p.product_name from product_class pc inner join product p on pc.product_class_id = p.product_class_id where 1=1 and (pc.product_category = ($P{Product_Category}) or $P{Product_Category} = 'All') and (pc.product_family = ($P{Product_Family}) or $P{Product_Family} = 'All') and (pc.product_department = ($P{Product_Department}) or $P{Product_Department} = 'All') and product_name is not null group by p.product_name order by p.product_name
